import React from'react';import{getUserInitials,generateAvatarColor,formatTimestamp}from'../../utils/helpers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserList=_ref=>{let{users,onUserClick,activeChat,activeChatType,isGroupList=false}=_ref;const getItemClass=item=>{const isActive=activeChat&&activeChat.id===item.id&&(isGroupList&&activeChatType==='group'||!isGroupList&&activeChatType==='direct');return`user-item ${isActive?'active':''}`;};const getStatusText=item=>{if(isGroupList){return`${item.members.length} members`;}else{return item.isOnline?'Online':`Last seen ${formatTimestamp(item.lastSeen)}`;}};const getAvatarColor=item=>{if(isGroupList){return'#28a745';// Green for groups
